IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: PRIVATELY FUNDED SCHOOL FOR STUDENTS IN PRE-K THROUGH GRADE TWELVE.
IRS990.MissionDescription: TO PROVIDE AN ACADEMICALLY CHALLENGING EDUCATION IN A WARM, SUPPORTIVE ENVIRONMENT TO A GROUP OF STUDENTS WITH A WIDE RANGE OF TALENTS AND SKILLS. STUDENTS SHOULD DEVELOP SELF-WORTH, AND AN APPRECIATION OF OTHERS OF DIVERSE CULTURAL, RACIAL AND ETHNIC BACKGROUNDS. TO HELP EACH STUDENT BECOME AN INDEPENDENT LEARNER WITH THE SELF-CONFIDENCE TO TAKE INTELLECTUAL RISKS ALONG THE EDUCATIONAL PATH.
IRS990.Description: PRIMARY AND SECONDARY EDUCATIONAL INSTRUCTION TO STUDENTS IN PRE-K THROUGH TWELFTH GRADE.

Activity2.Description: TRANSPORTATION SERVICES PROVIDED FOR STUDENTS TO AND FROM SCHOOL AND SPORTING EVENTS.

Activity3.Description: CAFETERIA SERVICES PROVIDED FOR STUDENTS OF INDIAN CREEK SCHOOL.

ActivityOther.Description: DAYCARE SERVICES PROVIDED FOR STUDENTS FOR BEFORE AND AFTER SHOOL CARE.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE FINANCE COMMITTEE REVIEWS AND APPROVES THE 990 BEFORE IT IS FILED. THE FINANCE COMMITTEE SUMMARIZES THE CONTENTS OF 990 AND PRESENTS TO THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENTS ARE SIGNED BY TRUSTEES AND KEY EMPLOYEES AND THE BOARD SECRETARY REVIEWS ON AN ANNUAL BASIS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES REVIEWS COMPARABLE SALARY SURVEY DATA FOR SIMILAR EDUCATION INSTITUTIONS (AIMS).

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 18
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: FORM 1023, 990, AND 990-T ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON WRITTEN REQUEST.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON WRITTEN REQUEST.
BOARD OF TRUSTEES ASSUMES RESPONSIBILITY FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT OF FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND SELECTION OF INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT. THIS PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
